markdown:
Skip to main content

![](/sites/default/files/2023-01/AircraftMaintenanceMech%20%28YOUTH%29.jpg)

As an Aircraft Maintenance Technician, you’ll greatly enjoy mixing your love of aviation with the satisfaction you get from doing careful and thorough work—every day. 

You’ll work alongside other aircraft trade professionals in a hangar or repair shop, or on an assembly line. As you inspect, maintain and repair different types of aircraft, you’ll quickly learn what makes each unique. 

#### What You'll Learn

  * How to interpret technical manuals, drawings and blueprints 
  * How to disassemble and reassemble aircraft 
  * How to remove and replace defective aircraft parts 
  * How to inspect aircraft and test aircraft systems 
  * How to document an aircraft’s maintenance history 



#### Key Job Skills

  * Critical thinking 
  * Aircraft maintenance and repairing 
  * Math and physics 
  * Aircraft systems (fuel, hydraulic, wing control) 
  * Structural materials and composites 



Work-Based Training

7200 HOURS

General Skills

[Athletic](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3AAthletic) [Collaborative](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3ACollaborative) [Mathematical](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3AMathematical) [Precise](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3APrecise) [Tactile](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3ATactile)

Note: Training Provider designation applications are not accepted at this time. For questions or support, please contact [designation@skilledtradesbc.ca](mailto:designation@skilledtradesbc.ca).

## 

Program Information

#### [Program Profile Occupational Description Aircraft Maintenance Technicians perform a broad range of tasks. They inspect and troubleshoot aircraft, including airframe structures, engines and systems. They disassemble and remove defective parts, while also assembling and installing replacements. They also interpret technical manuals, drawings and blueprints, test aircraft systems, record problems and action taken to rectify them, and maintain an accurate statement of maintenance history. View Profile](/media/478/download)
